abilities.description: (PASSIVE)MANA SURGEXerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.
abilities.name: MANA SURGEX

abilities.description: (Q)ARCANOPULSEFires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
abilities.name: ARCANOPULSEF

abilities.description: (W)EYE OF DESTRUCTIONCalls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
abilities.name: EYE OF DESTRUCTIONC

abilities.description: (E)SHOCKING ORBDeals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
abilities.name: SHOCKING ORBD

abilities.description: (R)RITE OF THE ARCANEXerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
abilities.name: RITE OF THE ARCANEX
